catalog_script_client.name: Handle Start date change

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_13e434d897787110db793dafe153af79
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:907332b397e03110db793dafe153afea</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Handle Start date change</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
function handleLoanerAssetAvailabilityResponse(response) {
    var answer = JSON.parse(response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute('answer'));
	g_form.hideFieldMsg('return_date');
    if (!answer.isAvailable) {
        g_form.showFieldMsg('return_date', answer.message, 'warning');
    }
}

function checkLoanerAssetAvailability() {
    if (g_form.getValue('location') !== ''
        && g_form.getValue('model') !== ''
        && g_form.getValue('start_date') !== ''
        && g_form.getValue('return_date') !== '') {

        var ga = new GlideAjax('sn_hamp.HampLoanerAjaxUtils');
        ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'isLoanerAssetAvailable');
        ga.addParam('sysparm_location', g_form.getValue('location'));
        ga.addParam('sysparm_model', g_form.getValue('model'));
		ga.addParam('sysparm_lead_time', g_form.getValue('lead_time'));
        ga.addParam('sysparm_start_date', g_form.getValue('start_date'));
        ga.addParam('sysparm_return_date', g_form.getValue('return_date'));
        ga.getXML(handleLoanerAssetAvailabilityResponse);
    }
}

function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    var startDate;
    var returnDate;

    function callback(response) {
        var msg;
        var answer = JSON.parse(response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer"));
        if (answer['isStartDateValid'] == false) {
            g_form.clearValue('start_date');
            msg = answer['startDateErrorMsg'];
            g_form.showFieldMsg('start_date', msg, 'error');
        } else if (answer['isReturnDateValid'] == false) {
            g_form.clearValue('return_date');
			msg = answer['returnDateErrorMsg'];
            g_form.showFieldMsg('return_date', msg, 'error');
        }
		//checkLoanerAssetAvailability();
    }
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }
    startDate = g_form.getValue('start_date');
    returnDate = g_form.getValue('return_date');
    //var ga = new GlideAjax('sn_hamp.HampLoanerAjaxUtils');
    //ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'validateDates');
    //ga.addParam('sysparm_startdate', startDate);
    //ga.addParam('sysparm_returndate', returnDate);
    //ga.getXML(callback);
}
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-08-17 13:33:21</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>13e434d897787110db793dafe153af79</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Handle Start date change</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Loaner" source="x_1068794_loaner">5a84b41697247110db793dafe153af8b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Loaner">5a84b41697247110db793dafe153af8b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_13e434d897787110db793dafe153af79</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-08-17 13:33:21</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Loaner Asset Request Variables">2c1b16fb97603110db793dafe153af36</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
